summary: This file contains ini settings that should be mostly universal for ENB's, originally it also contained a command line calle "GiveFirstBornToSheson". I figured out it was just a joke and does absolutely nothing to Skyrim. Sorry.
descriptionHtml:
Firstly this file contains ini settings that should be mostly universal for ENB's, namely Springtime ENB because that is what ENB I am using currently

This ini originally contained a new command line that I thought would help to fix crashes "GiveFirstBornToSheson". This was just a joke, and the members of Nexus were kind enough to point this out to me. Thanks guys!!!!! For anyone who downloaded this before I caught the error, I am deeply sorry for the misinformation. If you did happen to download this INI file with the "GiveFirstBornToSheson" you have nothing to worry about. Since the command does nothing it should not effect your game at all. The article where I originally found this hoax is below. 

http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=13&t=2729

If you do need a fix for the memory blocks getting used up and Skyrim Crashing I think I found a solution on Nexus, the link is below. Be sure to read the mod page for all the information. Again I think this is a fix for the problem, but I could be wrong. 

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50471/?

One last time the new INI file does not contain "GiveGirstBornToSheson" and it should bea universal INI setting for most ENB's. I am really sorry for the confusion I created.



V2:
This is just a small update to the original for those that use grass mods.
[Grass]bAllowLoadGrass=0 bAllowCreateGrass=1 bDrawShaderGrass=1iMinGrassSize=20
author: samueladams017
